items.title: The New King
items.descr: A large quarter pound patted atop bacon and lettus, topped with all the goods (onions, pickles, cheddar cheese, ketchup and mayo).

items.title: The Green Burger
items.descr: Fresh grilled quarter pound patty sitting on a fresh bed of green lettus, topped with onion, tomatoe, pickle and dijon mustard.

items.title: Sloppy Mike
items.descr: You wanted everything, we gave it all to you. (Too much cheese and mushrooms is never a problem)

items.title: Porter's Burger
items.descr: Quarter pound patty with melted swiss, topped with carmelized mushrooms and onions.

items.title: Coleslaw Jim
items.descr: Two fire grilled patties topped with our famous inhouse coleslaw.

items.title: Top of Ol' Smokey
items.descr: Half pound patty smothered with cheese and topped with peppers, pickles, onions and sliced tomatoes.

items.title: French Fries
items.descr: Just your plain traditional salted fries.

items.title: Onion Rings
items.descr: Nothing special here, except they're delicious.

items.title: Grilled Corn & Asparagus
items.descr: Fire grilled corn and asparagus to perfection.

items.title: Garlic Tots
items.descr: Home made garlic tots stuffed with cheese.

items.title: Stuffed Mushrooms
items.descr: Cheese and garlic stuffed mushrooms, grilled to perfection.

items.title: Strawberry Eclair
items.descr: Two sweet strawberry goodies that'll make your heart sing and your tummy dance.

items.title: Mini Burgers
items.descr: Our sweet macaroons are the perfect finish to your meal.

items.title: Cheesecake Buttons
items.descr: Two cheesecake delights topped with strawberry surup, candy cherry, and a chocolate shaving.

items.title: Whipped Chocolate Ice Cream
items.descr: It's so light and fluffy, you might want to tie it down.

items.title: Ultimate Smores
items.descr: Nothing beats our double sized marshmellows drizzled in chocolate surup.

items.title: Home made Oreo Cookies
items.descr: Our fresh whipped cream pressed between two fresh chocolate cookies.
